body:
> So I was wondering if it is planned to add this feature in the short term, 

We are unable to comment on timeframes for specific feature requests.  

>  any advice on how to speed up the graph building process?

This is a general TensorFlow usage question best suited for StackOverflow.  Please can you re-ask there. 
(In general, you would be better off avoiding adding large constants to your program.  Consider reading them as input, or computing them once at runtime.)
